I chose Dr. Anna Kowalska because of the great reviews. But I am honestly disappointed. The visits, although private, were very quick. I came for the first time with severe symptoms of dizziness and numbness in my limbs. After a 10-minute interview, Dr. Anna Kowalska referred me to physiotherapy, which the specialist did not want to undertake due to the nature of my symptoms. I returned for another visit to Dr. Anna Kowalska, and she again stated that there were no indications for further tests and that physiotherapy would be sufficient due to muscle tension.
A very empathetic and competent doctor. I felt better already on the first day of treatment. I highly recommend!

Although I was very stressed before the visit, it was extremely pleasant. Dr. Anna Kowalska devoted enough time to listen to all my concerns, and her way of conducting the conversation was full of kindness, for which I thank you very much again! I recommend to everyone, with Dr. Anna Kowalska the stress disappears :)
